title: U.S. Wants to See Russia Weakened, Says Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin After Ukraine Visit - The Wall Street Journal
content:
1. U.S. Wants to See Russia Weakened, Says Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin After Ukraine Visit  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Impact of Blinken and Austin's visit to Ukraine to meet with Zelenskyy  CBS News
  3. Russia's war in Ukraine: Live updates  CNN
  4. President Zelenskyy Meets With U.S. Top Officials In The Ukraine Capital  NBC News
  5. US diplomats' return to Ukraine, military aid among issues Blinken, Austin discussed with Zelenskyy  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Mr. Austin’s comments came after he and Secretary of State Antony Blinken met with Ukraine’s president and announced more U.S. military aid to the country. In neighboring Russia, large fires broke out at fuel-storage facilities, while Moscow attacked Ukrainian railway hubs.
